analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0xf6276830c265a779a2225b9d2fcbab790cbeb92b.sol:
	Contract XcelToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0xf6276830c265a779a2225b9d2fcbab790cbeb92b.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
BasicToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/2/0xf6276830c265a779a2225b9d2fcbab790cbeb92b.sol#83-87) should be declared external
